title: Workplace Mathematics Problem-Solving Project Utilizing Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts (equations, functions, statistics) and experience applying mathematics to professional tasks
context.additional_context: An environment supporting both asynchronous and real-time collaboration using digital devices (tablets/laptops).

Learners can develop and present work-related mathematical models with team members at least three times using digital collaboration tools (e.g., Google Jamboard).
